name: Bloody Mary
description:
What was supposed to be a game turned into a nightmare at the blink of an eye.
The last of the forbidden words got stuck inside your throat while an unreal coldness cut through the room.
Soon enough you realize that nothing about your situation is unreal, as what felt like a terrible nightmare slowly turns into a fight for your survival.

There is something... it is watching you... it is watching your every move... It is lurking in the darkness ready to strike when you don't pay attention.
There is something... following you... hunting you down... reaching for your soul... reaching for your live force...
It is reaching for your blood... with its cold, dead hands already around your throat.

Will you be able to survive?

Are you up for the challenge?



- escape the curse of Bloody Mary
- outsmart your deadly enemies
- survive the evil monster which hides inside of the darkness
- find the hidden keys for your escape
- learn about the creatures of the darkness in order to survive
- explore the darkness of the cursed house
- hide yourself from demonic encounters
- get scared in a atmospheric yet deadly dungeon of fear and madness
- experience the madness of the evil lost soul - Bloody Mary



We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators.
Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.
